name: Eyo - Jump 'n' Run RPG
description:
A Jump 'n' Run RPG experience

Trapped in the body of a rickety robot, you face a variety of challenges. Why are you a robot, what is this strange, dangerous place and why does everyone want to rule you? Upgrade your robot, equip powerful weapons and defences, and find out what's going on. You can expect merciless enemies, treacherous traps, tricky Jump 'n' Run passages and a unique, gripping story.



An unexpected story

Look forward to meeting Crowbar and Ava! These two are on an important mission to make the universe a better place! Your task will be to hunt down the cruel pirates who have taken up residence on the planet ZEN3. Fight the army of mqQ@trös:“__en ##ds mashineee… ###zz@zsnv... ERROR… ###ds@__.a... Hello? Are you there? I need a hand with something. Could you start the game and help me get out of here? Hey! You out there… I know you are reading this. Come on. Help me out here! An insane god is holding me imprisoned here! I'm counting on you! I’ll talk to you later. Don’t make me wait... Sincerely, Eyo



Upgrade your robot

You have the option of upgrading your robot to master even the most difficult challenges. There are various weapon and defence systems to choose from, all of which can be improved with additional upgrades. For some powerful weapon and defence systems, certain research must first be unlocked in a skill tree before they can be used. At the same time, you can increase the attributes of your robot according to your preferences. Develop your own play style, try out different constellations and use powerful synergies.



Master a world full of danger

Prove your skills in numerous levels and master all the challenges that await you on your journey. As the expedition progresses, the levels become increasingly difficult, intense and demanding. Do you have the necessary skill, willpower and stamina to tackle the tough levels? It's up to you, get ready for your adventure!
